meanings.definition: The state or quality of being alien or foreign.
meanings.sent1: The alienness of the new student made them stand out in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The alienness of the customs in the foreign country fascinated the traveler.
meanings.sent3: The alienness of the situation was so strange that it felt like being in a movie.
meanings.sent4: The alienness of the language barrier made communication difficult.
meanings.sent5: The alienness of the landscape was breathtaking in its uniqueness.

meanings.definition: The quality of being different or unfamiliar.
meanings.sent1: The alienness of the new technology confused the older generation.
meanings.sent2: The alienness of the concept took some time to grasp.
meanings.sent3: The alienness of the fashion trend made everyone look twice.
meanings.sent4: The alienness of the music genre was a refreshing change.
meanings.sent5: The alienness of the food's taste was surprisingly delightful.

meanings.definition: The state of being from another planet or world.
meanings.sent1: The alienness of the creature from outer space amazed the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The alienness of the spaceship landing was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The alienness of the alien's language sounded like gibberish to the humans.
meanings.sent4: The alienness of the extraterrestrial's technology was far beyond human comprehension.
meanings.sent5: The alienness of the planet's atmosphere made it impossible for humans to breathe.
